titles.title: HP489 From all that dwell below the skies

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
From all that dwell below the skies
Let the Creator's praise arise: Hallelujah!
Let the Redeemer's Name be sung
Through every land in every tongue. Hallelujah!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Eternal are Thy mercies, Lord:
Eternal truth attends Thy word: Hallelujah!
Thy praise shall sound from shore to shore
Till suns shall rise and set no more. Hallelujah!
